author: horwat
msg: Bug Fix: jspc didn't work well under windows since file separator assumed to be "/" in ParserController.resolveFileName

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a mime type for DTD files so that browsers don't try to interpret them as
HTML (due to the lack of a Content-Type header, as specified for 2.3).

author: remm
msg: - An end chunk could be printed in the middle of a response if
write(byte[] b, int off, int len) was called with len = 0.
